mapper.insert: insert into comment (content, created_at, modified_at,member_id,task_id) values (#{content}, #{createdAt}, #{createdAt},#{memberId},#{taskId})
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content}, modified_at=#{modifiedAt} where comment_id=#{commentId} and is_deleted is null
update comment set is_deleted=true where comment_id=#{commentId} and is_deleted is null
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE is_deleted is null
select * from comment where member_id=#{memberId} and comment_id=#{commentId} and is_deleted is null
select * from comment where task_id=#{taskId} and is_deleted is null
